text: Lisa Gartner is an American journalist. She won a 2016 Pulitzer Prize for Local Reporting, and Livingston Award . In 2019, she won a George Polk Award. She graduated from Northwestern University. She worked for the the Washington Examiner, Tampa Bay Times, Philadelphia Inquirer, and San Francisco Chronicle. == References == == Other websites == * Lisa Gartner of the Philadelphia Inquirer has won the George Polk Award for Justice Reporting Category:Living people Category:American journalists Category:Pulitzer Prize winners Category:George Polk Award winners Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Lisa Gartner
